definitions.definition: A very rapidly moving object, especially one that is thrown .
examples: The pitcher threw a real zinger and struck him out.

definitions.definition: A surprising or unusually pointed , humorous and impressive insult or insulting quip.
An event that when experienced leaves the witness dazed , either physically or metaphorically.
examples: I was still reeling from the zinger of seeing my ex on a date with my best friend.

definitions.definition: An outstanding, energetic and surprising thing or person.
A piece of food or drink that is tart and stimulating .

main_definition: ( informal ) A very rapidly moving object, especially one that is thrown .
